category.description: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and ingredients normally intended for use in the preparation of foodstuffs; products normally used to supplement foodstuffs or as a substitute for foodstuffs

vatRateResults.comment: Annex 2 of the German VAT Act contains a list of goods falling under the reduced rate of 7% such as live animals, meat, milk and so on. For legal certainty please have a look at the German VAT Act.

category.description: Transport of passengers and their accompanying luggage

vatRateResults.comment:
Reduced rate on local transport (within a local community or if the transport distance does not exceed 50 km) and rail-bound transport.
See preliminary remarks to “Reduced rates” and the “General comments” field

category.description: Admission to shows, theatres, circuses, fairs, amusement parks, concerts, museums, zoos, cinemas, exhibitions and similar cultural events and facilities

vatRateResults.comment:
Reduced rate only on admissions to theatres, concerts and museums, as well as circus performances, performances as performers and transactions directly linked to the operation of zoological gardens.
See preliminary remarks to “Reduced rates” and the “General comments” field

category.description: Supply of services by writers, composers and performing artists, or of the royalties due to them

vatRateResults.comment: See preliminary remarks to “Reduced rates” and the “General comments” field

category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment:
Only for short-term accommodation.
See preliminary remarks to “Reduced rates” and the “General comments” field

category.description: Supply of goods and services by organisations recognised as being devoted to social wellbeing by Member States and engaged in welfare or social security work

vatRateResults.comment:
Reduced rate only applicable to supplies of goods and services of organisations pursuing non-profit making, charitable or ecclesiastical purposes. VAT reduction not applicable to supply of goods or services to be made within the context of a profitable Business.
See preliminary remarks to “Reduced rates” and the “General comments” field

category.description: Provision of medical and dental care and thermal treatment

vatRateResults.comment:
Reduced rate only on the supply of services by dental technicians in their professional capacity and the supply of dental prostheses by dentists and dental technicians.
See preliminary remarks to “Reduced rates” and the “General comments” field

category.description: Supply of goods and services by organisations recognised as being devoted to social wellbeing by Member States and engaged in welfare or social security work

vatRateResults.comment: VAT - Import - Reduced rate only applicable to supplies of goods and services of organisations pursuing non-profit making, charitable or ecclesiastical purposes. VAT reduction not applicable to supply of goods or services to be made within the context of a profitable Business. See preliminary remarks to “Reduced rates” and the “General comments” field.

category.description: Transport of passengers and their accompanying luggage

vatRateResults.comment: VAT - Import - Reduced rate on local transport (within a local community or if the transport distance does not exceed 50 km) and rail-bound transport. See preliminary remarks to “Reduced rates” and the “General comments” field.

category.description: Admission to shows, theatres, circuses, fairs, amusement parks, concerts, museums, zoos, cinemas, exhibitions and similar cultural events and facilities

vatRateResults.comment: VAT - Import - Reduced rate only on admissions to theatres, concerts and museums, as well as circus performances, performances as performers and transactions directly linked to the operation of zoological gardens. See preliminary remarks to “Reduced rates” and the “General comments” field.

category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment: VAT - Import - Only for short-term accommodation. See preliminary remarks to “Reduced rates” and the “General comments” field.

category.description: Provision of medical and dental care and thermal treatment

vatRateResults.comment: VAT - Import - Reduced rate only on the supply of services by dental technicians in their professional capacity and the supply of dental prostheses by dentists and dental technicians. See preliminary remarks to “Reduced rates” and the “General comments” field.

category.description: Supply of services by writers, composers and performing artists, or of the royalties due to them

vatRateResults.comment: VAT - Import - See preliminary remarks to “Reduced rates” and the “General comments” field.
VAT - Import -
